alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Applications of science give man unprecedented power over nature and space. This gift will be a great joy to mankind if society is intellectually, spiritually, and morally deserving of it -- otherwise, mankind will have set the stage for the creation of a hell here on Earth and in space."

- Dr. Robert J. Moon, International Journal of Fusion Energy, Vol. 3, No. 1, January 1985
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Unprecedented Power Over Nature and Space
